p.s: The speech at COP26, given by Boris Johnson on 1 November 2021 deals with the importance of COP26 the turning of the climate change and the responsibility of this generation to stop the climate change.
Boris Johnson's idea of the climate crisis is dramatic.
He compares the situation with a James Bond film in which he hast to defuse a bomb while the clock is ticking down.
But he also points out that there is enough new technology to fight against the climate change.
Furthermore he points out the duty of the industrialized countries to take action and help the other countries with their technology to stop climate change.
He draws a picture of James Bond to show his view on the climate crisis.
Those who participate in COP26 are in the same position as James Bond in his films.
They have to work under pressure to stop climate change as the time is ticking.
Therefore he describes the role of COP26 for this fight against the imaginary clock.
COP26 how's the chance to turn around the things in terms of climate crisis but if they fail the following generations will not forgive their generation and judge them very hard.
At the end he states that COP26 will not be the end and they have to take action now.
